describe.heading: Which describes you best?
describe.p: This will help us personalize your experience.

interest.heading: Which are you most interested in?
interest.p: Choose just once. This will help us get you started (but won't limit your experience)

option.main: Learning specific skills to advance my career
Exploring new topics I'm interested in
Exercising my brain to stay sharp

place.heading: You're in the right place
place.p: Brilliant gets you hands-on to help improve your professional skills and knowledge. You'll interact with concepts and solve fun problems in math,science and computer science.

comfort.heading: What is your math comfort level?
comfort.p: Choose the highest level you feel confident in — you can always adjust later.

way.heading: You're on your way!
way.p: Through its engaging and well-structured courses, Brilliant has taught me mathematical concepts that I previously struggled to understand. I now feel confident approaching both technical job interviews and real world problem solving situations.
way.author: — Jacob S.

paths.heading: Learning paths based on your answers
paths.p: Choose one to get started. You can switch anytime.
